name: ora_obd2_device_model
description: Device Model for OBD2 standard devices

attributes.description: Engine Coolant Temperature(in degree Celsius) Mode:01, PID: 05
attributes.name: ora_obd2_engine_coolant_temperature

attributes.description: The mass of Air in grams per second consumed.
attributes.name: ora_obd2_mass_air_flow

attributes.description: Number of confirmed emissions-related Diagnostic Trouble Codes available for display. Mode:01,PID:01,Bits:A6-A0
attributes.name: ora_obd2_number_of_dtcs

attributes.description: The elapsed time (seconds) since the engine was started, Mode:01,PID:1F
attributes.name: ora_obd2_runtime_since_engine_start

attributes.description: The absolute pedal position (not the relative or learned) pedal position. Usually above 0% at idle and less than 100% at full throttle Mode:01 PID: 11
attributes.name: ora_obd2_throttle_position

attributes.description: Total fuel used by a vehicle.
attributes.name: ora_obd2_total_fuel_used

attributes.description: The current speed of the vehicle measured in Km/hour. Mode:01,PID:0D
attributes.name: ora_obd2_vehicle_speed

formats.name: ora_obd2_vehicle_started_alert
formats.description: A General Vehicle Started Alert whenever vehicle starts to move (speed > 5 MPH)

formats.name: ora_obd2_vehicle_stopped_alert
formats.description: A General Vehicle Stopped Alert whenever vehicle comes to a halt (speed == 0 MPH)
